title: Find the Button: Apocalypse Edition
briefDescription: Welcome to my second Find the Button map. Last time, I made a Find the Button map where you only have half heart to beat ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to my second Find the Button map. Last time, I made a Find the Button map where you only have half heart to beat it. And now, I made another one, but each level is infested with zombies! That means you have to fight off zombies while finding the button!
How to play? It?s simple. You have to find the button while being chased by zombies. Before you start, you will receive a diamond and an emerald. Use those to buy equipments before starting the game. You can buy weapons, armor, and even special foods with different perks!
Special Foods:
? Toughness Cookie (Decreases taken damage by 40% for a short amount of time)
? Adrenaline Donut (Increases movement speed by 20% for a short amount of time)
? Healthy Burger (Receives instant health upon eating)
Here?s some screenshots of the map:

briefDescription: This is a sky block map but with my own twist. I have added new island that are not in a normal sky block and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a sky block map but with my own twist. I have added new island that are not in a normal sky block and added my own twist to the other islands.
There is one island for every tree type in the game and one ore island that is covered in fire and lava but if you can get past it there is lots of riches.

title: Three Connected Treehouses
briefDescription: A couple of treehouses, there is a farm room, a bedroom, and storage, crafting, furnace. They are made of oak and birch, the roofs and ...

crawledImageUrls.text: A couple of treehouses, there is a farm room, a bedroom, and storage, crafting, furnace. They are made of oak and birch, the roofs and floors are Birch, the walls are made of Oak and the corners are Oak Wood logs. it is an old-world btw.

title: Escape from Granite Peak
briefDescription: Find the massive cavern with dangerous ledges and you are close to escaping Granite Peak! Updated with teleporters so you can choose where to start ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Find the massive cavern with dangerous ledges and you are close to escaping Granite Peak! Updated with teleporters so you can choose where to start the adventure. Chests along the way give you food, swords, and armor. You can?t dig through the floors or walls, because bedrock is behind them. Find enough chests and you?ll have the parts to craft a pickaxe.

Updated rooms improve the journey. When the rooms were carved out, care was taken to preserve the natural formations, when possible. You will see deposits as they were created, but no longer surrounded by stone.
There? are some mobs along the way.
No digging is necessary to find your way to the cavern.
If you make it to this room, you?ve escaped from Granite Peak! Stay in survival mode if possible.
Thanks to those who helped.

title: Hide And Go Edawg (Updated) 1.16 Bedrock
briefDescription: This was fun Hide and Seek map me my cousins worked on. It has tones hidden secrets and areas to explore. Plus lots of parkour ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This was fun Hide and Seek map me my cousins worked on. It has tones hidden secrets and areas to explore. Plus lots of parkour and some other mini games too like spleef, pig racing,shoot the minecart, Slap them off, connect 4, noughts and crosses (Tic Tac Toe), Foot Race, Isolation, Build Battle and Rock Paper Scissors.

Hide And Go Edawg
The reason why it is called hide and go edawg instead of hide and seek is because we originally built a similar map on a server called edawg and played it there (Server Ip for Java Players: EDAWG878.COM).

Rules of Hide and Go Edawg
Be welcome to play around with certain rules
Main rules of Hide and Go Edawg:
1)No ones allowed to break or place blocks in a match
2)Hider starts game with a knockback wooden sword (If you want to get rid of nametags you can effect the hider with invisibility and give them leather armour or trust the seekers to turn off nametags in their settings)
3)Seeker starts game with Enchanted diamond sword and armour, and a Glistering Melon (Glistering Melons can be used to enter the theme park)
4)Once a hider is found unless there is no hiders left that hider must become seeker.
5)If a Hider dies not from a seeker or a seekers wolf, they must tp back to the hider area (They do not become seeker)
6)The seeker goal is to kill all hiders
7)The Hider goal is to survive for as long as possible, but they can do one of these things.
1.Just Hide
2.Try and visit every area
3.kill a non afk seeker
Other gamemodes:
1.Try Playing the game but give every player and elytra and fireworks
2. Instead of hide and seek try doing survival games by having everyone tp to hider area and locate items around the map. (Have a time at the start where no one can pvp)
3.Try some of the minigames that can be located in spawn

title: HardCoreLine 2 Official Map
briefDescription: Have you seen the hit YouTube series HardcoreLine? Have you seen Permadeath and wanted to play it? Well, congratulations bro, you've come to the right ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you seen the hit YouTube series HardcoreLine?
Have you seen Permadeath and wanted to play it?
Well, congratulations bro, you?ve come to the right place. Built by MikeGsYT for the official series on YouTube created by AventurasIronKira.
Permadeath is a great project of the renowned ElRichMC, but logically its members are YouTubers or famous streamers, and it is also carried out in JAVA EDITION.
Well, the RevolucionLineSMP team has decided to bring this to the reality of Bedrock Edition to make our own series.
And since it has been a bit recognized in the community, we have made the decision to share the map that has caused so many deaths ..
It is an ordinary survival mode map, with the only difference that it is in ?HARDCORE? mode, so when you die you cannot spawn again.

To activate the ?HARDCORE? mode you must take the unobtainable items that are in the shulker near the spawn.
In this you will find two types of items:
-steve?s skull named ?muerte?
-steve?s skull named ?day +?
With the skull called ?muerte? the death of a player is detected.
If for any reason it is removed from the inventory, the player will die and be expelled from the world.
With the head called ?day +? you increase the days that are in the game, to keep a better control of the time played.
When a player dies or drops their unique item, they are teleported far away from the spawn of the world, a title notifies the other players of the death, and immediately afterwards, the player is expelled from the world while an infinite storm begins that gives effects to the hostile mobs, such as:
-Speed
-Strength
-Jump
-Invisibility
The map is 100% programmed so that when a death occurs there is a notification to the other players and a kick for the deceased.
At the moment only the change of 1 -3/30 is implemented
-1 inventory slot.
all hostile mobs are more hostile (all credits for the creator) Addon
there are mutant entities (all credits for the creator) Addon

call your friends to enjoy this adventure and together defeat the villains.

title: My Redstone Smart House? V2 [Redstone]
briefDescription: An improvement to the fan favourite My Redstone Smart House I introduce to you... My Redstone Smart House V2!! Achievements edition, bigger, better, improved, and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
An improvement to the fan favourite My Redstone Smart House I introduce to you? My Redstone Smart House V2!! Achievements edition, bigger, better, improved, and now in survival! Filled with many new contraptions, and a new nether, this Smart Mansion is ready and waiting for you and all the adventures you will go on!
This map features a big mansion which is suitable for all kinds of adventures where you need somewhere safe to stay. There is one master bedroom (with 8 beds combined) and lots of different redstone mechanisms which will greatly improve your standards of living. Outside you will also find multiple different types of automatic farms. You could literally stay within the boundaries of your property and still survive for a long time. Creator: DireWolf314159

title: 404 Challenge (Survival Challenge)
briefDescription: 404 Challenge is the oldest Minecraft challenge. You need to grab everything that you need to survive in the cave and after the night come out ...

crawledImageUrls.text: 404 Challenge is the oldest Minecraft challenge. You need to grab everything that you need to survive in the cave and after the night come out you broke a gravel and the cave appeared. Try to survive in the cave as long as possible without placing a torch.
After you load the world in Minecraft, on the right side you will see many gravel next to the water.
After you destroy one of the gravel blocks.

title: The Fortress
briefDescription: Set in an alternate reality where the End, Nether, and Overworld have collided, a massive fortress has been built to protect the survivors.You are ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Set in an alternate reality where the End, Nether, and Overworld have collided, a massive fortress has been built to protect the survivors.
You are the Overworld?s last hope
(This is a work in progress.)
You are the last known human survivor of an apocalypse in which the Overworld, Nether, and End collided, creating an extraordinarily dangerous landscape. Luckily for you, a massive Fortress had been built, giving you a safe-haven in the uncertain apocalyptic world.

The Fortress?s walls are lined with obsidian, to protect from the ghasts, creepers, and other monsters which haunt the once (relatively) peaceful Overworld. Because the Fortress was originally built with the intention of containing an entire town, there is plenty of storage space for anything. Unfortunately, not much was placed into storage before the devastating collision, so you will have to brave the harsh environment to collect many items necessary for your survival. However, food and water are not an issue, as an entire farm has been built inside the facility, along with a well. Additionally, once you bring an item safely back to the Fortress once, you can use the in-house cloner to replicate it in the future.

title: Skyblock: Fan-Made Update
briefDescription: The Skyblock Version 2 has been the most popular custom survival map made by Noobcrew (Original Creator), where you spawn in the middle of nowhere with ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Skyblock Version 2 has been the most popular custom survival map made by Noobcrew (Original Creator), where you spawn in the middle of nowhere with limited resources to survive.
But what happens if the creator made a third update, or even more updates?
Explore the original islands and new islands created by me to have more fun survive, here?s a full list:
The Place where you start your adventure (Standard Map)
The Place where you start your adventure (3 Times smaller/More Challenging)

A Island filled with sand and cactus
(Throw away the sandstone)

A Island filled with Glowstone blocks close to the Nether Portal
(Mushrooms are in the chest)

A Place filled with Soul Sand and a planted Nether Wart
Chest Content: Jungle Sapling, Cocoa Beans and Beetroot Seeds
A Island with a generator than spawns Blazes

A Island filled with a Slime Generator and a chest
Chest Content: Villager Eggs and Spruce Sapling

title: Mr. Meat 1.9.2 BETA 0.9 (Horror)
briefDescription: This is a horror map, in it you have to find out the secret of Mister Meat and save the girl! Look for clues, solve ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a horror map, in it you have to find out the secret of Mister Meat and save the girl! Look for clues, solve puzzles! Will you be able to find out the secret and save Alelia? Good luck! ATTENTION! THIS IS THE BETA VERSION OF THE MAP, HERE COULD BE BUGS, DEFECTS, ETC ? SO DON?T HAVE TO COMPLAIN ABOUT THIS. WE WILL FIX EVERYTHING IN THE RELEASE OF THE MAP.
Run away from the scary zombie, get the jail break & solve this criminal case!

The zombie plague arrived to your neighborhood! Your neighbor, the butcher, is a zombie hungry of blood. He has no soul and only wants kill, to have blood and fresh meat to eat. He has become a serial killer and his house in a mix between a haunted house and a prison. This creepy zombie, known as Mr. Meat, is a serious criminal case. His new hostage? A girl. She is locked in this prison house that seems a haunted house. Death is after her, your scary zombie neighbor is going to slay her?if nobody avoid it. Your mission is rescue her and save her life!

How to do it in this horror game adventure?
? The walking dead can hear your moves, use this to your advantage and hide to mislead him. If their eyes catch you, he?ll try to kill you!
? Solve puzzles to rescue the girl alive from the house of the serial killer.
? Use the gun and be a sniper! Be the zombie catcher that this game needs! Action is guaranteed!
? Enjoy excellent ambiental sounds and graphics during your jail break!
If you want a realistic, creepy and scary sniper, zombie catcher experience, play now ?Mr Meat: Horror Escape Room?. Action, blood and fear assured!
Headphones are recommended for a full experience against the walking dead neighbor.
In each update new content will be available to solve this criminal case. We are open to suggestions by email or in the review section!

title: SkyBlock WAT (Survival Map)
briefDescription: SkyBlock WAT is a Multiplayer a skyblock with 8 Islands, You can also play with single player. Can you make it to the End? Let's find ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
SkyBlock WAT is a Multiplayer a skyblock with 8 Islands, You can also play with single player. Can you make it to the End? Let?s find out. However this map is still in Beta Testing there could be some bugs.
SkyBlock Wat is a Multiplayer skyblock with 8 Islands. The Starter Island the place where you start. The Bonus Island, a copy of the starter Island but better lol there?s nothing much about it. The Ice Island, the place where it?s cold and slippery and there?s a secret below (wink). The Mushroom Island, where there?s a lot of mushrooms and also ores, good if you?re running out of ores. The Nether Island, The Place where it?s hot and you can also cook inside the Nether haha (just kidding). The Village Island, the place where there?s 2 villagers with a long nose lol nothing special about them they just offer garbage trades lol. The Desert Island, The place where all the sands is created and there?s nothing special about it. The Ender Island, the final Island. You need to beat the Big Fat Dragon with the Big Fat Purple Eyes to beat the Skyblock. You can also play with single player. Can you make it to the End? Let?s find out. However this map is still in Beta Testing there could be some bugs.
About Skyblock WAT :
You?ll be spawned at an Unknown Small Island where you have to survive and build the way to the other Islands. every Islands has secret treasures except the Starter Island.

title: DUNGEONS ? Minecraft rpg map
briefDescription: Discover amazing locations! Fight against a variety of enemies! Earn experience points and invest in new, better weapons and face new, more powerful opponents! Solve ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Discover amazing locations! Fight against a variety of enemies! Earn experience points and invest in new, better weapons and face new, more powerful opponents! Solve logical puzzles and uncover the secrets of the places you are in!

The main task is to survive. Discover new locations with ever new opponents. Solve puzzles and find hidden objects to help you move on. All levels are divided into 3 types: easy, medium and hard. For passing an easy level you get 2 LVL, for passing a medium level 15 LVL and difficult level 30 LVL + xp from defeated mobs. For LVL you get loot boxes and additional equipment such as arrows. Weapons and armour elements fall out of the loot boxes. Most of them are non-standard (not in the classic minecraft). Additionally there are ?supply boxes? with free food and arrows.
1)How to gain levels (?LVL? is a currency):
1.1 By completing dungeons
1.2 By putting useless items to ?Trashcan?
1.3 By defeating monsters
2)Dungeons:
All dungeons are divided into 3 types: easy, medium and hard.
?Completing an easy level gives you: 2 LVL
?Completing a medium level gives you: 5 LVL
?Completing a hard level gives you: 30 LVL
P.s. LVL-is an in game currency, and at the same time, in game experience points.
3)Shop:
There are 2 shops, first one is the ?Items shop?, second one is the ?Loot box shop?
3.1 Items shop:
You can buy arrows
3.2 Case shop/Box shop:
You can buy boxes
4)All levels:
4.1 Easy levels:
? Grim forest
? Mineshaft
4.2 Medium levels:
? Cave
? Creeperland
? Ruins
? Underwater
4.3 Hard levels:
? Dungeon
? Pillagers? mansion
? Canyon
Content:
?More than 9 unique maps to complete!
?Custom weapons/blades/armors/artifacts to get!
?Easter eggs/secret chests to find!
?Logical puzzles to solve in almost every level!
?Attractive cases/boxes to open!
Additional info:
Supply box:
The box which gives you some food & arrows every 20 real time minutes.
Supporting single player/multiplayer:
Supports both, and unlimited amounts of players.
You can join our Discord server, and ask something/give feedback about this map or report issue(s)! (Don?t forget to ping @IkoMaster and @PanGangowski when giving feedback/info. about an issue/etc.)
Good luck Adventurer!
Fill out an anonymous survey on this map:
https://forms.gle/qgZ2m3tbyh2WMrJ76

title: Black Lake Camp (Hide & Seek)

crawledImageUrls.text:
Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the seeker. The seeker is released is 1 minute after the game starts. The seeker?s mission is to kill all the hiders, if you really want you can set your own timer and when that timer ends the players that are left over have won.

2. Camp Site
3. Camp Fire
4. Toilet
5. Forest
6. House
7. Lake

title: Crashed Plane Island Survival (Update II)
briefDescription: You are a hard working person who decided to take a vacation from work. You purchased a ticket to fly to Hawaii for a couple ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
You are a hard working person who decided to take a vacation from work. You purchased a ticket to fly to Hawaii for a couple weeks. You hopped on the plane and you started to fly to Hawaii. Half way there you hear an explosion from one of the engines and everyone started to panic. You remained calm and tried to think about what to do. You ended up blacking out and 5 hours later you wake up on the plane that was split into 2 pieces. You look around and you see an island. Looks like you were the only survivor who survived the brutal plane crash. Your goal is to survive on this island until you get rescued. Please leave any feedback or suggestions in the comments. Good luck!

title: NETHERCORE
briefDescription: A very Nether themed version of COREBLOCK, my first map that had made it into MCPEDL, anyway i had decided to do this because of ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A very Nether themed version of COREBLOCK, my first map that had made it into MCPEDL, anyway i had decided to do this because of the nether update, since it made skyblock in the nether possible
This map basically functions as the same as CoreBlock, except the difference is you start off in the nether, using your skills and intelligence of how spawns, tree growth, and bartering you will be able to get to your goal of killing the wither, with the help of some addons like my NetherCore Addon, the help of the Seives and OmniTools Addon by Amon28, it will be possible to beat the map,
Storyline: Youve beaten the wither, but his soul had fled to the nether world, his home world, you follow him and realize that he his home had met the same fate, you soon realize he mightve done the curse because of what your kind did to him, but nonetheless you set out a new quest to kill him once and for all
I did my beat to put alot of the nether themed stuff into the map?These Include:
-Piglin Bartering
-Netherrite Recipe
-Hoglins as the only Food Source
-BASALT GENERATORS
-Crimson Wood(Warped wood recipes coming soon)
-Respawn Anchor

Now Sieves are gonna be a very much needed thing in this map, because you can use gravel from piglins and sieve them
here is a demo to how Sieves are used
There are upgradable Meshes, from string to Gold to Iron to Finally Diamond, you will need to upgrade these in order to get better loot
??????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
now using the Dropper as a sort of custom crafter to progress into the map, you will need the Recipes(Found in the google drives) to be able to know what and how to craft
Due to the Fact that sieves are only created with Oak Planks, i have taken it myself to make a custom recipe that allows you ti craft it with Crimson Planks?.seen in the Recipes Link
Here are some examples of Recipes to use in the Dropper:
And here is a demo of the crafting
